@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@

+
+// xfail-test FIXME #11741 tuple structs ignore stability attributes
+
+#[deny(experimental)];
+
+use std::unstable::simd;
+
+fn main() {
+    let _ = simd::i64x2(0, 0); //~ ERROR: experimental
+}
